page.title: 20Buxhall - Personal Mobility
page.content:
Households without use of a car during the day can be very isolated. Bus services are poor and it is a long walk to facilities eg shop, Post Office, playgroup, in the next village - 2.5km along roads with no pavements.
The nearest doctors surgeries are in Stowmarket and Woolpit.
Credits
Research and Text: Great Finborough Womens' Institute, in particular Kathy Cape, Lesley Cass, Trudy Gray, Brenda Grimaldi, Judy Rolfe and Mary Williams.
Tecnical advice: John Williams
Photography: Trudy Gray and John Rolfe
